verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> concerning <WH1697> the famine <WH1226>.
Judah <WH3063> mourns <WH56>, and the gates <WH8179> there languish <WH535>; they are black <WH6937> unto the ground <WH776>; and the cry <WH6682> of Jerusalem <WH3389> is gone up <WH5927>.

And their nobles <WH117> have sent <WH7971> their little ones <WH6810> to the waters <WH4325>: they came <WH935> to the pits <WH1356>, and found <WH4672> no water <WH4325>; they returned <WH7725> with their vessels <WH3627> empty <WH7387>; they were ashamed <WH954> and confounded <WH3637>, and covered <WH2645> their heads <WH7218>.
Because the ground <WH127> is cracked <WH2865>, for there was no rain <WH1653> in the earth <WH776>, the plowmen <WH406> were ashamed <WH954>, they covered <WH2645> their heads <WH7218>.
Yes <WH365>, the doe also calved <WH3205> in the field <WH7704>, and forsook <WH5800> it <WH1877>, because there was no grass.

And the wild donkeys <WH6501> did stand <WH5975> in the high places <WH8205>, they snuffed up <WH7602> the wind <WH7307> like dragons <WH8577>; their eyes <WH5869> did fail <WH3615>, because there was no grass <WH6212>.

O Lord <WH3068>, though our iniquities <WH5771> testify <WH6030> against us <WH6213>, do it for your name <WH8034>'s sake <WH4878>: for our backslidings are many <WH7231>; we have sinned against you <WH2398>.

O the hope <WH4723> of Israel <WH3478>, the savior <WH3467> there in time <WH6256> of trouble <WH6869>, why should you be as a stranger <WH1616> in the land <WH776>, and as a wayfaring man <WH732> that turns aside <WH5186> to stay for a night <WH3885>?

Why should you be as a man <WH376> astonished <WH1724>, as a mighty man <WH1368> that cannot <WH3201> save <WH3467>? yet you <WH3068>, O Lord, are in the midst <WH7130> of us <WH7121>, and we are called by your name <WH8034>; leave us not <WH3240>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> unto this people <WH5971>, Thus have they loved <WH157> to wander <WH5128>, they have not refrained <WH2820> their feet <WH7272>, therefore the Lord <WH3068> does not accept <WH7521> them <WH2142>; he will now remember their iniquity <WH5771>, and visit <WH6485> their sins <WH2403>.
Then said <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> unto me <WH6419>, Pray not for this people <WH5971> for their good <WH2896>.

When they fast <WH6684>, I will not hear <WH8085> their cry <WH7440>; and when they offer <WH5927> burnt offering <WH5930> and a oblation <WH4503>, I will not accept <WH7521> them <WH3615>: but I will consume them by the sword <WH2719>, and by the famine <WH7458>, and by the pestilence <WH1698>.

Then said <WH559> I <WH162>, Ah, Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>! behold <WH5030>, the prophets say <WH559> unto them <WH7200>, You shall not see the sword <WH2719>, neither shall you have famine <WH7458>; but I will give <WH5414> you assured <WH571> peace <WH7965> in this place <WH4725>.

Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH5030>, The prophets prophesy <WH5012> lies <WH8267> in my name <WH8034>: I sent <WH7971> them not <WH6680>, neither have I commanded them <WH1696>, neither spoke unto them <WH5012>: they prophesy unto you a false <WH8267> vision <WH2377> and divination <WH7081>, and a thing of nothing <WH457>, and the deceit <WH8649> of their heart <WH3820>.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> concerning the prophets <WH5030> that prophesy <WH5012> in my name <WH8034>, and I sent <WH7971> them not <WH559>, yet they say, Sword <WH2719> and famine <WH7458> shall not be in this land <WH776>; By sword <WH2719> and famine <WH7458> shall those prophets <WH5030> be consumed <WH8552>.

And the people <WH5971> to whom they prophesy <WH5012> shall be cast out <WH7993> in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389> because <WH6440> of the famine <WH7458> and the sword <WH2719>; and they shall have none to bury <WH6912> them <WH1992>, them <WH802>, their wives, nor their sons <WH1121>, nor their daughters <WH1323>: for I will pour <WH8210> their wickedness upon them <WH7451>.

Therefore you shall say <WH559> this word <WH1697> unto them <WH5869>; Let my eyes run down <WH3381> with tears <WH1832> night <WH3915> and day <WH3119>, and let them not cease <WH1820>: for the virgin <WH1330> daughter <WH1323> of my people <WH5971> is broken <WH7665> with a great <WH1419> breach <WH7667>, with a very <WH3966> severe <WH2470> blow <WH4347>.

If I go forth <WH3318> into the field <WH7704>, then behold the slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>! and if I enter <WH935> into the city <WH5892>, then behold them that are sick <WH8463> with famine <WH7458>! Yes <WH5030>, both the prophet and the priest <WH3548> go about <WH5503> into a land <WH776> that they know not <WH3045>.

Have you utterly <WH3988> rejected <WH3988> Judah <WH3063>? has your soul <WH5315> loathed <WH1602> Zion <WH6726>? why have you struck <WH5221> us <WH4832>, and there is no healing for us <WH6960>? we looked for peace <WH7965>, and there is no good <WH2896>; and for the time <WH6256> of healing <WH4832>, and behold trouble <WH1205>!
We acknowledge <WH3045>, O Lord <WH3068>, our wickedness <WH7562>, and the iniquity <WH5771> of our fathers <WH1>: for we have sinned against you <WH2398>.
Do not abhor <WH5006> us <WH8034>, for your name's sake <WH5034>, do not disgrace the throne <WH3678> of your glory <WH3519>: remember <WH2142>, break <WH6565> not your covenant with us <WH1285>.

Are there <WH3426> any among the vanities <WH1892> of the Nations <WH1471> that can cause rain <WH1652>? or can the heavens <WH8064> give <WH5414> showers <WH7241>? are not you he <WH3068>, O Lord our God <WH430>? therefore we will wait <WH6960> upon you <WH6213>: for you have made all these things.
